qcv1

Class GateByGateCircuit

  • java.lang.Object
    • qcv1.GateByGateCircuit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QCircuit
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackwardQFTCircuit, ForwardQFTCircuit, GroverGateByGate

    public class GateByGateCircuit
extends java.lang.Object
implements QCircuit
    A gate by gate quantum circuit that is independent of the gate representation.
    Author:
    Michael Chiang
